subject: Doping (Sports)
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The former coach Trevor Graham is suing the United States Anti-Doping Agency, saying the agency ruined his name when he was accused of providing performance-enhancing drugs to athletes.
snippet: The former coach Trevor Graham is suing the United States Anti-Doping Agency, saying the agency ruined his name when he was accused of providing performance-enhancing drugs to athletes.
